u.a: ava climbs immediately onto car and begins to turn wheel . looks around the room and announces this . she gets off car , picks up telephone and climbs back on car .
CHI runs dunebugqy along floor near car , making appropriate motor noises .
ava climbs off car and walks over to oven , while announcing a possible plan .
CHI leaves dune buggy and comes over to oven and begins to speak .
but he is interrupted by this emphaticly , as ava waves him away from oven .
CHI quietly asks this while gazing at poster above oven .
ava answers quietly , with direct gaze .
CHI asks if he can help , with direct gaze .
ava refuses him and attempts to find something to occupy him while she is in "kitchen" . she points at poster , CHI follows point .
with no reaction from CHI , she says this with emphasis .
she orders this , looking toward couch .
CHI refuses pretend role emphatically , with direct gaze , shaking his head .
ava asks this while turning knobs on
CHI answers this in high voice and shrug of shoulders .
ava asks this still watching oven
CHI answers this with direct gaze .
ava decides on another plan , and climbs on car , leaving CHI to the oven .
asking for an agreement .
CHI accepts new role , apparently pleased that the oven is his . this is said smiling , with direct gaze to ava on car .
ava agrees
ava turns wheel and "drives" while CHI watches with interest and then turns to oven .

CHI hears that and interprets it as valid warning and gets up with this and takes magnifying glass away from front of car and returns to oven . ava continues to "drive" after watching him rescue magnifying glass .

when CHI returns to oven , some pot or pan falls off oven and CHI says this to self , and attracts ava's attention . CHI picks up broom and sweeps behind car , ava watches for moment and then gazes around room with back to CHI .
ava returns to "driving" . CHI again interprets "watch out" as warning to something in front of car and walks around to front of car and looks for something to remove .
ava asks this with direct gaze .
CHI mutters this in mimic under breath .
ava spies girl in poster on wall and gets sam's attention with this
ava asks .
CHI answers this with comment on
what the girl appears to be doing in poster .
ava again becomes bored with what she's doing , climbs off car , and moves off camera .
CHI takes telephone off car and climbs on .
CHI assuming ava's role and assigning her to his former role and begins to turn steering wheel .
ava commands this in high voice .
CHI asks this still turning wheel .
is interrupted by ava's question .
CHI excitedly "drives" , ava comes over to car and picks up broom and sweeps around car , watching CHI with interest .
ava suggests this to CHI to make his driving more enjoyable .
CHI takes her suggestion .
CHI continues turning steering wheel while ava holds up something , off camera , and asks this .
CHI turns around on car and answers with shout this , which was hard to understand .
ava requests clarification here with rising intonation .
she gets no answer rephrases her question .
CHI , standing on car , turrs back to ava , and answers while turning wheel .
ava obviously not ready to give up sam's attention , persists with another question
this elicits an answer , and then direct gaze from CHI , who , still standing , turns and halfsits on wheel .
ava continues with questioning , as she walks to cradle .
CHI watches and answers , and spies baby in cradle
CHI quickly corrects himself in louder voice .
ava picks up doll and hugs and cuddles it and gently sings to it . CHI climbs off car and watches and reaches out to touch doll in ava's arm , obviously very interested .
CHI then takes a look in cradle and finds animal puppet and calls it and puts it on hand .
ava puts bottle in baby's mouth and continues to speak to it in soft lilting voice .
ava takes it over to sofa and stands on sofa .
CHI comes over to sofa and has puppet ask this in strange loud voice .
ava pauses for a moment and chooses not to pursue sam's pretend play and sits down on sofa and continues singing to the baby here , completely ignoring CHI .

CHI watches , takes off puppet , and then reaches into sofa for the baby's bottle and ava quickly reprimands at first in strong voice and then in softer voice as she realizes she is talking in front of the baby .
ava takes doll's hat off and asks this of CHI .
CHI answers with much interest , watching every move , leaning against edge of sofa .
ava comments .
ava asks with emphasis on "now" . CHI answers this just to be helpful .
ava does not want this answer , and repeats her question rephrased negatively .
and elicits correct answer this time .
ava adjusts hat and asks again .
eliciting response from CHI .
ava adjusts hat again and asks .
elicits another immediate response from CHI . both children seem to be smiling throughout the routine .
ava addresses first part of this to doll and looks up at CHI and asks , "right ?" .
CHI answers this
ava repeats question assigning him new role
CHI accepts and answers .
ava seems to be testing his acceptance of roles when she comments , but CHI responds negatively and designates what it is he associates a girl with a baby as doing
requests confirmation .
with direct gaze , ava begins identifying herself .
ava is not satisfied with that one and rephrases .
rephrases .
rephrases , this time looking down at doll as CHI walks away . ava still wants to play and calls him back with a name she knows he will answer to "hey , dad ."
CHI answers with direct gaze .
and ava responds , as she gets off sofa and climbs onto car .
CHI gives his permission
a second time with more emphasis and follows her to car after putting down stuffed tiger he had picked up a minute ago .
ava adds this
CHI comes over , puts his hand on wheel , and stutters , and asks permission of her in turn with direct gaze .
CHI walks to oven and busies himself with pots and pans while ava actively "drives ." CHI gives permission after watching to see that baby is put safely aside
ava actively "drives ."

CHI again hears "get out of the way'' and gets up to see what is obstructing the car , tripping and falling on the way and kicks a telephone away from the front of the car while ava pauses and watches .
after having done his duty , CHI returns to oven and ava continuos driving and adding sound effects .
but stops turning wheel and slides off side starting to announce her arrival
ava answers with direct gaze and puts doll behind her and again but CHI interrupts in very loud voice .
ava carries doll to se corner and attempts to put it in lunchbox . at end of this CHI walks over to ava and watches
asks for confirmation .
answers this with force .
ava continues attempts at closing lunchbox and says to baby
ava continues attempts at closing lunchbox and says to baby
ava carries her over to cradle and puts it down
CHI follows and comments strongly about care of baby .
ava ignores and picks up broom , and turns back on sam
CHI persists and asks for confirmation twice , a little more emphasis on second this .
ava ignores again
leans broom against wall .
CHI quickly accepts job
reaches for broom and knocks it down .
ava kneels in front of oven and comments
CHI , with broom in hand , asks this .
gets no response and requests clarification of his role
still no response and answers his own question .
is interrupted by ava's statement .
receives prompt reply .
comments while still cooking with back to CHI .
CHI tries to lean broom on cradle and speaks .
ava interrupts
but CHI repeats and asks for "okay" ,
lets broom fall to floor , receives response .
but must not have heard it as he repeats statement and question
ava answers a little louder this time , but still has back to CHI .
apparently independent play with attempts at interaction and very loose role play . makes more sound effects .
CHI moves toward car , with hand on wheel , turns to ava and asks but gets no response .
ava loudly announces this and carries pot over to se corner where plates are . ava's "announcer like" tone , almost sung .
ava's "announcer like" tone , almost sung . CHI follows obediently , ava repeats loudly , and carries pot and spoon to car .
CHI brings two plates and puts them on car beside pot and mutters under breath .
mutters under breath .
ava's "announcer like" tone , almost sung . ava climbs onto car being careful not to disturb CHI as he arranges plates .
ava's "announcer like" tone , almost sung .
CHI starts as command and then asks for confirmation he wants to eat . she wants to take a drive . ava ignores him
ava states this turning wheel .
CHI quickly agrees and watches her drive .
ava muttcrs this to self while turning wheel ,
CHI puts hand on wheel to stop it and shouts this
takes stern father role , and tries to push her off car .
she holds on tighter and with direct gaze , says this .
CHI stops pushing
comments and walks away from car dejectedly to sofa .
ava continues driving .
turns to CHI with direct gaze as he pulls snakc off sofa with back to ava .
said in "scary" voice .
ava asks this
CHI answers with direct gaze , showing her the snake .
ava asks this and CHI makes sound effects
he moves snake to touch ava .
ava backs away almost falling off car and climbs off continuing to watch CHI and snake , her back to camera .
CHI says in scary voice and throws snake back onto sofa and returns to car while ava observes .
CHI claims car and climbs on .
ava runs to cradle , in whining voice
takes doll out of crib , hugging it , takes it to sofa .
CHI observes with interest and finally turns to car and drives , makes sound effects , hears ava's baby noises and turns to her and asks .
ava ignores and in "breathy" voice . being ignored , CHI turns to wheel and drives .
ava interrupts screeching tire noise and speaks to doll .
CHI turns to her and seconds her command while climbing off car .
ava requests aid in disciplining doll
CHI quickly complies , walking to sofa .
ava playfully pretends he commanded her and asks for reason to go to sleep .
CHI conforms with father baby roles
ava persists in her play .
CHI comes over to sofa and answers emphatically in loud voice .
CHI repeats the word as ava instructed
ava teasingly asks this . ava corrects the way in which he said "because"and demonstrates where the emphasis should be .
CHI screams his replies as he picks up the tiger and examines it .
ava coy asks this
CHI quietly gives a reason .
ava is unsatisifies with that crime , loudly suggests another
CHI screams agreement
CHI screams agreement
ava suggests another form of discipline , screaming the commands .
CHI readily complies .
ava playfully refuses .
CHI screams this
ava loudly replies this .
CHI becoming more frustrated , seems to think about resorting to violence .
then this loudly says
hits ava twice and walks to oven , aggressively slams door , knocks plates and pan off car .
ava obviously enjoying this pretend scene invites more discipline , CHI complies and hits her several times .
ava pretend cries , and whiningly says this .
CHI emphatically refuses
carries teddy bear toward car .
ava asks in quiet submissive voice
CHI answers quickly , takes teddy bear toward oven .
ava asks with rising intonation .
CHI screams this and pretends to throw bear up in air while holding onto it .
CHI loudly states this .
ava asks quietly .
CHI shouts statements while swinging teddy bear around .
CHI shouts statements while swinging teddy bear around .
CHI throws bear on ava , who is half way on sofa . CHI steps on bear and sits on it and ava wanders over to car and climbs on .
CHI follows her with gaze and mutters to himself .
ava loudly calls and CHI loudly
immediately answers .
ava begins with request and finishes with loud command to CHI to repeat her pretend command , patting seat behind her to show him where to sit .
CHI walks over , shouts , patting seat where ava had .
ava adds this and goes back to allow CHI to sit in driver's seat .
CHI misunderstands her allowance to let him drive and attempts to confirm who is to drive , turning wheel and making sound effects .
at CHI gets off car having arrived at destination
picks up dune buggy and puts it on car .
ava inspects dune buggy and asks about object inside .
CHI volunteers his services and attempts to get on car
specifies when he will work on dune buggy always asking for an "okay ."
ava mutters this under her breath as she fiddles with dune buggy and CHI watches , twisted in car seat .
CHI situates himself in seat and proceeds to drive , commanding ava to move her dune buggy back to give him more room . ava sits quietly on back , still holding dune buggy between them on seat .
